dataModel.title: Vegetation Plots Database Component Description: place
dataModel.author: J. Harris
dataModel.description: This table associates plots with named places.

entity.entitySummary: This table is the intersection between the plot table and the namedPlace table and is used for querying for plots located in a named place or named places in which a plot or group of plots are located.

attribute.attNotes: Primary key for the place table
attribute.attDefinition: Database generated identifier assigned to each unique plot occurrence at a place.

attribute.attNotes: Foreign key into the plot table.
Foreign key into the namedPlace table
attribute.attDefinition: Link to a specific named place.
